name: The Expanse
description:
The Expanse is a FPS VR survival game where you team up with other players online or you can play alone and fight off hords of zombies The Expanse is set in the year 2095 you and your team of elite killers must join forces to fight of waves of zombies that have invaded earth. As the you kill off zombies the waves gets harder as you progress.

Key Features!
*You can play Mutiplayer or Solo
*Several gamemodes to choose from (Team Death Match,Capture The Flag,Free for all,Co-op Zombies).
* There are mutiple weapons to choose from ranging from pistol to rifle to sniper.
*Need weapons but dont want to buy them off the wall well there is a work station to get your health and weapons from.
*Don't like guns well we have a sword to hack and slack your enemy's with.
* Looking for a VR game that can be played standing or sitting well look no further.
*Built in height adjustment and full body locomotion for VR.
*Ever want to swim in the ocean in VR or Fly around and fight off waves of monsters then Join The Expanse.
*Space exploration will be a feature we will be realeasing in the near feature.
